Uses of Class
edu.purdue.cs.percolator.StyleChecker

Packages that use StyleChecker
Package Description
edu.purdue.cs.percolator
Contains the implementations used to grade assignments.

  • Uses of StyleChecker in edu.purdue.cs.percolator

    Methods in edu.purdue.cs.percolator that return StyleChecker
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static StyleChecker StyleChecker.lint​(String directory, String policyFile)
    Creates a new StyleChecker with the given directory and policy.
    StyleChecker StyleChecker.withDeduction​(double points)
    Specifies the amount to deduct from the score per code style infraction.
    StyleChecker StyleChecker.withMaxScore​(double maxScore)
    Specifies the maximum score for the code style check.
    Methods in edu.purdue.cs.percolator with parameters of type StyleChecker
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    AutoGrader AutoGrader.withStyleChecker​(StyleChecker styleChecker)
    Specifies a StyleChecker object to run a code style audit with after grading.
